example[0]: a listing of all households in the district
definition[1]: if a company has a listing on the stock exchange, it can offer its shares for sale
definition[2]: when a company is on an official list of shares which can be bought on a particular stockmarket
example[1]: The new company hopes to obtain a Milan stock exchange listing after merging with its main competitor last week.
definition[3]: a list of all the television programmes, plays, films etc that are on over a particular period of time showing the times and places for them
definition[4]: a list of figures, names etc
